TopicTitle: What's your "just one last mission" for 0.90?

Articles.Content:
Me, I pulled off an Eve return mission from sea level last night. Had some problems due to design flaws, but after changing the mission plan and foregoing some science, I made it back to Kerbin.

> 
> 
> 
> 
> <iframe width="480" height="270" src="https://www.youtube.com/embed/31BtLboVW6M?feature=oembed" frameborder="0" allowfullscreen="true"></iframe>

> ![bhhNjR9.png](http://i.imgur.com/bhhNjR9.png)

So, what did you do the last few days... or are going to do until 1.0 hits on Monday?
Abusing the aero one last time to refuel my E-Asteroid Catcher (which is in a retrograde orbit). I plan to send it to the mun and back, which will put it on a prograde orbit.

Because the main changes in 1.0 is related to aerodynamics (at least in my opinion, because mining is not *changing* for me technically, it's an *addition*) I thought about making a big plane that will fly all over the globe (or at least to the pole). We will not see the old aero anymore, so it's my way to say "farewell". And then I want to recreate such design in 1.0 and check if it will fly and how far it can get ![:D](//kerbal-forum-uploads.s3.us-west-2.amazonaws.com/emoticons/default_k_cheesy.gif)
Blow everything up...

I'm currently working an a Jool-4.

Edit: Aaaaand, my agency went bankrupt, as twice the unmanned test-launch went wrong, the 1.2 Megafunds rocket blew up, and took the launchpad with it... I'll try to do the mission in sandbox now...

**Edited <time datetime="2015-04-25T13:38:37Z" title="04/25/2015 01:38  PM" data-short="9 yr">April 25, 2015</time> by soulsource**
SSTO to Duna and back, just finished it actually.

Re-enacting this scene by landing all the ships in my save to get the money to buy a similar mothership that will transport all my kerbals to 1.0

[https://www.youtube.com/watch?v=Imi5aR-JHT8](https://www.youtube.com/watch?v=Imi5aR-JHT8)
"Just one more asparagus launch"
Finish the testing phase of my Space Shuttle (codename: Beta Concept) and use the Shuttle to deliver the Cupola module to the Orbital Station 'Sausage 2' (similar in concept to the Soviet Salyuts).

Recovering my inbound kerbals from Jool, land on Eeloo and return inmediately (hey, the return window is just 9 days after arrival!). And say goodbye to stock aero

![1r549amu](http://tinypic.com/1r549amu)

Oh, well, I'll still find a way to put such things in orbit. Infernal Robotics to rotate the wheels and engines, so they launch vertically and then they rotate for a horizontal landing perhaps?

I want to complete my 'Project Magellan' polar circumnavigation of Duna. I have all the equipment in orbit, now rounding up crew members to send on the mission. I'll let someone else find the bugs in 1.0 for a while ![;)](//kerbal-forum-uploads.s3.us-west-2.amazonaws.com/emoticons/default_k_wink.gif)

My last missions are all about deorbiting everything around Kerbin.

This is the main station Modul 8 and it claimed 4 lives due to starvation (TAC). Jeb came in a ship to deliver the fuel for deorbiting and the station sucked away his oxygen, turning him into a fifth casualty. I don't even remember when was the last time I lost Jebediah.

![B6EF443EB1099942CC597404FE1B5D1994E1E0D5](http://images.akamai.steamusercontent.com/ugc/28488380143460021/B6EF443EB1099942CC597404FE1B5D1994E1E0D5/)

![925490A457E1B5296D5DCD059B67B0A7FAC016BD](http://images.akamai.steamusercontent.com/ugc/28488380143460506/925490A457E1B5296D5DCD059B67B0A7FAC016BD/)

![C888600115CDA329978FD5B57D7A518231D6151A](http://images.akamai.steamusercontent.com/ugc/28488380143464737/C888600115CDA329978FD5B57D7A518231D6151A/)

There are still two satellites to destroy or bring home safely.
I'm hoping to do a medium-sized mission to Duna. I'm gonna build a mothership with a probe and lander and head for Duna, landing kerbals on Ike and the probe on Duna.
Make a memorial and blow it up before I reinstall KSP tomorrow.
My "final mission" is building plane after plane in sandbox, to give the old soupy atmosphere a good send off.

Mission to Sarnus:

[![screenshot1661_zpsvoong0ss.png](http://i1383.photobucket.com/albums/ah315/Yukon0009/screenshot1661_zpsvoong0ss.png)](http://s1383.photobucket.com/user/Yukon0009/media/screenshot1661_zpsvoong0ss.png.html)
i made a warp ship that will transport the original three to 1.0

Making my last Tri-Fighter IV before i have to say farewell to getting to 200km AP on pure jets.....

While im not absolutely positve jets are going to be worthless in 1.0 for ion sstos, considering how OP turbojets were, i do see a large probability that they will nerf jets especially a higher speeds/altitudes to the point that i cant use pure ion+jet combos on a SSTO anymore.

Then im sending my final AKSTechnologies fleet into the jool system, finally got a puler rocket to lift the bloody ships (without fairings craft made outta mostly wings are screwed when being pushed by a bottom rocket). That im actually hoping to see go, as it looks like fairings will be able to shield something from aerodynamics. Then again, im also hoping the fairings come in capital ship sizes, a fairing that cant cover a massive battlecruiser is kinda useless to my space program (err massive war campaigns).

Finished assembling my fuel depot.

![eNjhI9o.png](http://i.imgur.com/eNjhI9o.png)
there is no last mission... every activity was stopped to participate the 1.0 release party... don't drink and fly rockets!
Finishing a massive Duna mission I've been planning for ~16 episodes. ![:)](//kerbal-forum-uploads.s3.us-west-2.amazonaws.com/emoticons/default_k_smiley.gif)
Return mission to the Evian surface with FAR en DRE installed ... !

Random what I don't even.

> [Javascript is disabled. View full album](//imgur.com/a/GhtOF)

Also, my Duna mission:

> [Javascript is disabled. View full album](//imgur.com/a/mIJk8)
Welp, now that this thread exists I might make one final desperate push for my Jool-5 mission over the weekend. Instead of doing productive things of course xP

I'm sending a fleet of space shuttles into the sun, at real time, with a TWR of about 100.... i've set it perfectly to when my computer opens on Tuesday Morning so I can crash them, then get 1.0 while it's lukewarm.
